name: The Witching Hour (Makbeard)
description:
The loose theme in this game is that it is Halloween and some magic has animated some creatures around the graveyard and you as the local witch have to deal with them.  

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys

Attack with Mouse Left-Click.

A quick 15 minute game with 4 stages. Same level just increasing difficulty and number of enemies.

Thanks for playing!

I created this game during the Fall of 2017, I tried making it in only a couple weeks, but it took a couple months for me to get it to where its at.
